code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProductForm=_ref=>{let{product,onSubmit}=_ref;const[name,setName]=useState(product?product.name:"");const[description,setDescription]=useState(product?product.description:"");const[price,setPrice]=useState(product?product.price:"");const[inventory,setInventory]=useState(product?product.inventory:"");const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();const productData={name,description,price,inventory};onSubmit(productData);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,className:"space-y-4 p-4 bg-white rounded shadow-md",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Nombre del producto",value:name,onChange:e=>setName(e.target.value),required:true,className:"w-full p-2 border border-gray-300 rounded"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Descripci\xF3n",value:description,onChange:e=>setDescription(e.target.value),required:true,className:"w-full p-2 border border-gray-300 rounded"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",placeholder:"Precio",value:price,onChange:e=>setPrice(e.target.value),required:true,className:"w-full p-2 border border-gray-300 rounded"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",placeholder:"Cantidad en inventario",value:inventory,onChange:e=>setInventory(e.target.value),required:true,className:"w-full p-2 border border-gray-300 rounded"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"w-full bg-blue-500 text-white p-2 rounded",children:product?"Actualizar Producto":"Agregar Producto"})]});};export default ProductForm;
